Representation Terminated by Death
Representation ends when a represented person dies.
References
:  For more information on
revoking a POA due to death of the represented individual, see
M21-1, Part I, Subpart i, 2.C.1.f
Veteran first notice of death processing, see
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart i, 1.A
, and
representation of survivors after the claimant’s death, see
M21-1, Part I, Subpart i, 2.A.7
.
